archimate:Facility.name: Dynamics 365 SaaS
archimate:Facility.documentation:
MS Dynamics 365 instance that supports POLs Customer Contact centre to support NBSC, POEX and CCU.
NBSC: National Business Support Centre. Supporting Postmasters and POL Product support and client teams POEX: PO EXternal Helpline. Customer helpline dealing with 1st line complaints. 50% of calls are transferred to other POL contact centres that are product specific (Travel insurance card account etc. RMG products) CCU: Customer Care Unit. Deals with Customer complaints, re-in branch service, product issues, etc.
